column1:
J__B_,"2010-08-27T20:09:54.383Z","Memories...","This minifig is very reminiscent of Dr. Kilroy, from Adventurers. To me, that's the #1 reason to own this guy. Now we just need a King Leo... PLEASE LEGO? PLEEEASE?

The bioniculars are a good addition. That, along with the white hat, give the minifig a good ""explorer"" look.

Oh, and that MAGNIFYING GLASS---just awesome. It really works--it's fun to look into it, right at the minifigs head.

Bottom line--Not as good as the Pharoh or Spartan, but a very good addition to Series 2.


",TRUE,5,5,5,5,4

tyuku57,"2010-08-28T13:31:43.647Z","jungle hacker","

In my opinion the jungle explorer is the second best minifigure you can get (the spartan).

The hat is the best minifigure hat (next to spartan helmet) and is the same as indiana jonses dads hat but a different colour and his magnafine glass really works,binoculars are awsome and two come with him so there is a spare.
Unlike most minifigures his legs are patterned and his torso too.

overall this is a good minifigure and i hope this review helped

",TRUE,5,5,3,5,5

column2: Explorer is the the best minifigure in series 2!&nbsp
column3: He comes with very cool pieces and his shorts can make other minifigures like your own adventurer or Steve Irwin.&nbsp
column4: I enjoy playing with him all the time.

column1: Comes with cool body, legs, head with monical, magnifying glass, cool hat, a stand, and two binoculars
When you bed the legs the is still color

column2: I would recomend these set to set to any one! I give it a 10/10!

column1:
Firox_5000,"2010-09-25T17:48:53.077Z","good old school figure","

I bought this figure during a 3 for 2 offer at argos.

column2: 16 figures released in the series 2. It comes with 6 pieces and is easy to build.

column1: The explorer figure is really nice he includes a magnifying glass,binoculars and explorer hat. He may not have any actual new or unique pieces but he is very good in another way. The figure
column2: is very similar to dr kilroy and sam sinister as seen in the adventurers theme. He has an old school style&nbsp
column5: might expect to find in the 90's.

column1:
overall he is a Pretty good figure and I suggest you try hard and find him or buy him on ebay.

",TRUE,4,4,3,4,3
